item.title: Hawaiian Airlines and Air China have partnered on a codeshare agreement
item.description:
Hawaiian Airlines and Air China, China’s national airline, have partnered to provide travelers with expanded options and easier connections. This agreement comes after Hawaiian launched its new non-stop service to Beijing, operating three times a week. “We are thrilled to collaborate with Air China to expand our reach beyond Beijing, allowing our customers to conveniently explore more Chinese cities with a single ticket from Honolulu,” said Mark Dunkerley, Hawaiian Airlines President and CEO...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/hawaiian-airlines-and-air-china-have-partnered-on-a-codeshare-agreement/
